channel.title: Poltergeist - Designed to drive your friends insane
channel.description:
[b]-PROGRAM-[/b] Poltergeist, a program that bugs your friends till they get a hemorage.
[b]-BUGS-[/b] Open Taskbar = Runtime ERROR Remove Taskbar = Runtime ERROR
[b]-SCREENIEZ-[/b] COMING SOON!
[b]-COMPLETE-[/b] ########## 90% DONE!

item.title: Poltergeist - Designed to drive your friends insane
item.dc:creator: @VB6_FTW VB6 FTW
item.description:

is there a button to get rid of all the karma from someone?

item.title: Poltergeist - Designed to drive your friends insane
item.dc:creator: @MybJames MybJames
item.description:
@MybJames wrote:

[quote=“Buzzy, post:6, topic:122348”][quote author=VB6 FTW link=topic=172023.msg1590274#msg1590274 date=1184274639]
Yeah thats a whole bunch of crap :D.
[/quote]

Ok? Your dumb. I ask a question, and you give me the information I already knew. I meant what actions and functions does it take to achieve your friends hemorrhages… Second of all. No, karma does exist. Hope you figure it out before it’s to late.[/quote]
Wrong, bill gates fucks people over daily, he is (2nd) richest man in the world.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @xxhellfirexx xxhellfirexx
item.description:
@xxhellfirexx wrote:

I don’t see the point to this. Why do you want to be such a nuisance to others and cause troubles? Jokeware does not do anything useful. Just a waste of space. Remember this: “What goes around comes around” and “Treat others as you would want them to treat you.”
